protocol.name: P-GSE28183-1
text: VALUE = Expression ConsoleTM Version 1.1 signal intensity

protocol.name: P-GSE28183-2
protocol.text: Two-week-old seedlings were subjected to light intensity stress (400 µE m-2 sec-1, 25°C) for 30 min.

protocol.name: P-GSE28183-3
protocol.text: The wild-type plants and KO-HsfA1d/A1e mutants were grown (16 h light, 25°C/8 h dark, 22°C) on MS medium under a light intensity of 100 µE m-2 sec-1.

protocol.name: P-GSE28183-4
protocol.text: Sepasol-RNA I extraction of total RNA was performed according to the manufacturer's instructions.

protocol.name: P-GSE28183-5
protocol.text: Biotinylated cRNA were prepared according to the standard Affymetrix protocol from 100 ng total RNA (GeneChip 3'IVT Express User Manual, Affymetrix).

protocol.name: P-GSE28183-6
protocol.text: Following fragmentation, 12.5 ug of cRNA were hybridized for 16 hr at 45℃ on GeneChip Arabidopsis ATH1 Genome Array. GeneChips were washed and stained in the Affymetrix Fluidics Station 450.

protocol.name: P-GSE28183-7
protocol.text: GeneChips were scanned using the Affymetrix GeneChip Scanner 3000.

protocol.name: P-GSE28183-8
protocol.text: The data were analyzed with Expression ConsoleTM Version 1.1 using Affymetrix default analysis settings and global scaling as normalization method.
